name: Prototyper
description:
Automate gamepad prototyping in Figma. Works with Xbox, PlayStation and Switch controllers.


Create prototypes navigable with DPad, Left & Right Sticks, Shoulder & Trigger buttons or custom button assignments. You can also add Smart Animate transitions and swap variants in your prototype.


Usage

Generate Prototype: Select component instances within a single top-level frame to generate a complete prototype.


Link Frames: When not working with components, manually design each top-level frame in the prototype, select the frames, then link them to create a prototype.


Prototyper will automatically assign navigation inputs based on the relative position of selected elements i.e. if two components or frames are arranged horizontally, they will be navigable with the left / right inputs of your selected control scheme.


When creating prototypes from asymmetric grids, you may need to adjust the position of elements so Prototyper can assign the correct navigation input to the elements.


Open Source

Prototyper is open source and contributions are welcome!
